public final class SwapAuthenticationsTag
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTagSupport

Used to swap out Authentication objects in the current security context. See http://jira.semanticbits.com/browse/CAAERS-4098

Author:
dkrylov
See Also:
http://jira.semanticbits.com/browse/CAAERS-4098, OriginalAuthenticationHolder, FabricatedAuthenticationFilter
